1.0.name: wordpress/quote-pixel-and-random-images
1.0.description:
Pixel Random Quotes Images is a widget. Your quotes and images are randomly displayed in the Widget. You can delete, modify and upload quotes and images. It is a translation ready plugin.

For more info: http://belicza.com/wordpress/random-quotes-and-images-pixel-plugin/

A few notes about the sections above:

  • Require 2.8 Wordpress minimum
